title: Bug 121170 - getcolumnlabel should return user recognizable strings
description: The current behavior of the getcolumnlabel method is not returning user recognizable strings. This is problematic because these labels need to be displayed to the end user before extraction. The method should return the same labels as after extraction.
OB: The getcolumnlabel method is not returning user recognizable strings.
EB: The getcolumnlabel method should return user recognizable strings.
SR:
1. Call the getcolumnlabel method.
2. Check if the returned value is a user recognizable string.
